Description.Text: This hotel is situated by the sea on the Cartaromana Beach, around a 10-minute drive from Ischia Porto and away from the hustle and bustle in busy periods. The hotel can also be reached by boat taxi. Naples-Capodichino airport is approximately 49 km from the hotel.
Guest rooms are equipped with an en suite bathroom with a shower and hairdryer, heating, a TV, desk and Internet access. All rooms have sea views.

Guests looking for a hotel and restaurant on Ischia which combines style with tranquillity have come to the ideal place with this hotel. It is a typical residence with no frills, where the warm and genuine atmosphere will make any stay unforgettable. Facilities available to guests at the 15-room beach hotel include a lobby, bar and Internet access.
